StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Genetic and Epigenetic Determinants of Pediatric Obesity-Associated Asthma

Person.Organization: ALBERT EINSTEIN COLLEGE OF MEDICINEALBERT EINSTEIN COLLEGE OF MEDICINE, INCMONTEFIORE MEDICAL CENTER (BRONX, NY)

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The data collection was supported by NIH / NHLBI grant K23 HL118733. The investigators would like to thank the participating children and their families.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Based on the informed consents and due to the nature of the data collected only full or expedited approvals are appropriate, and this study requires annual review. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB, COL)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB-COL
